title: The Big Suey: Roger Bennett, God Of Soccer
description:
The Big Suey begins with Charles Barkley and TNT and moves to the Clippers broadcasts, Aaron Rodgers and Russell Wilson's struggles, and Greg's Lobos update. Then, Men in Blazers' Roger Bennett joins us to discuss a flurry of soccer topics including the upcoming World Cup in Qatar and their human rights violations, U.S. coaching, Mike Ditka, and his new book "Gods of Soccer: The Pantheon of the 100 Greatest Soccer Players."
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
